item.title: Comedy on Prescription? Pilot Raises Hopes for NHS Care
item.description: Early pilot data suggest comedy-based social prescribing could complement care, boost wellbeing, and ease pressure on NHS services. Press Association

item.title: Study Maps Extensive Disease Links Beyond Childhood Eczema
item.description: Using millions of NHS records, researchers mapped extensive links between childhood eczema and later inflammatory and eye diseases. Medscape News UK

item.title: Home Visits Don't Reduce Heat-Related ED Use in Older Adults
item.description: Medicaid home visits before heat events are not associated with changes in emergency department visits among older adults during extreme heat, a study...

item.title: Which Imaging Method Best Detects At-Risk MASH?

item.title: Probiotics May Have Benefit for AD in Kids After 2 Months
